1370: Lotijn moved to De Tuyt.A.1 after marriage.
Got married to Hildeburgis at age 25 in 1370.
1371: Had a son with Hildeburgis, Wolfraem, at age 26.
1373: Had a son with Hildeburgis, Mauricius, at age 28.
1377: Had a daughter with Hildeburgis, Liudburgis, at age 32.
1378: Had a daughter with Hildeburgis, Breghlent, at age 33.
Lost daughter Breghlent when Breghlent was 1 years old.
1380: Had a son with Hildeburgis, Bobone, at age 35.
1385: Lost his wife Hildeburgis while she was giving birth to Aue in 1385.
